overview: John Cageâ€™s original concept of Ocean, in 1991, was for a dance to be performed in a circular space, with the audience surrounding the dancers, and the musicians (112 of them) surrounding the audience. The last performance was in the Rainbow Quarry in Minnesota, September 2008, at which time the piece was filmed by Charles Atlas.
tagline: The Merce Cunningham Dance Company dances in the Rainbow Quarry
title: Ocean
